Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.utils

Class ObjectClickListeners

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.utils.ObjectClickListeners
public class ObjectClickListeners extends Object
This static class contains all the methods that are called when one element in the dining room is clicked

      value - the value of the assistant clicked
      element - the Node wrapping the assistant image

    • setIslandClicked

      public static void setIslandClicked(javafx.scene.Node element, int numSteps, int islandIndex)
      This method gets triggered when the user clicks on an island
      Parameters:
      element - the Node wrapping the island image
      numSteps - the number of steps Mother Nature should be moved of
      islandIndex - the index of the selected island
